/usr/bin/c++   -Wall -Wpointer-arith -Wunused-macros -Wsign-conversion -Wsign-compare -fno-common -g -ggdb -DDEBUG  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/ptr_arith.dir/ptr_arith/ptr_arith.cpp.o  -o ptr_arith  -L/usr/local/lib64 -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib64 -lpmemobj -lpthread libtest_backtrace.a libvalgrind_internal.a
